item.title: Nintendo GameCube – Nintendo Classics adds Wario World
item.content:encoded:
• Switch 2

Ready to rumble with Wario?

Wario World is now available via the Nintendo GameCube – Nintendo Classics app for Switch 2, Nintendo announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via the back of its box:

Ready to rumble with Wario?

You’d BETTER be ready, punk! Some evil jewel transformed all of my treasure into monsters, and now I gotta go to this weird world and beat it out of ’em! There are plenty of goons waiting for a shot at old Wario, but don’t worry about me, baby I’m ready to brawl! I’ll be throwing punches, charging through crowds, and piledriving ugly mugs right and left. What you gotta worry about is keeping me alive. Can you handle that, or do I have to give you a knuckle sandwich too?

Watch a trailer below.

Wario World Trailer

English

Japanese

item.title: Jaws: Retro Edition announced for PS5, Switch
item.content:encoded:
• PS5
  • Switch

The 1987-released NES classic returns.

Limited Run Games, in partnership with Universal Products & Experiences, has announced Jaws: Retro Edition for PlayStation 5 and Switch. Pre-orders physical editions will begin on December 19, 2025 and end on January 18, 2026 via Limited Run Games.

Jaws: Retr Edition is a re-release of the 1987-launched Nintendo Entertainment System title Jaws, which was developed by Westone and produced by ATLUS.

Here is an overview of the game, via Limited Run Games:

About

This can’t be! There has never been a Great White in these warm tropical waters before, NEVER! This is more than a coincidence…this shark appears to be possessed…as if it’s hunting you down… like it’s personal. You’d better prepare yourself and strike back before it’s too late.

Will you use the mini-sub, sea plane, sailboat, or just scuba gear? Perhaps it won’t even matter. Remember, this is some kind of unbelievably powerful eating machine you’re dealing with.

Quick, grab your weapons, pack your explosives, and check your maps. It’s out there…you know it…and it’s coming for you. This is serious! This is the ultimate Jaws challenge, because this time it’s not over until only one of you is left alive.

Key Features

  • Save Anywhere
  • Rewind
  • Achievements / Trophies
  • Music Player
  • Gallery

The physical editions are as follows:

Retro Edition – $34.99

  • Physical copy of the game
  • 8-page Booklet

Jaws: The Bigger Boat Edition – $99.99

  • Physical copy of the game
  • Everything included in the Retro Edition of the game
  • Nintendo Entertainment System-inspired box
  • Game soundtrack on a physically pressed CD
  • Pin badge Jaws keychain
  • Pixelated shark lamp

A release date was not announced.



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/12/jaws-retro-edition-announced-for-ps5-switch
